title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: Some years ago, I won a decent amount of money from a sports bet. It was the equivalent of $550 in my local currency. I was thrilled. I decided that I was going to spoil myself a little. It coincided with the time Sony announced the price of the new PlayStation 5. The price was the equivalent of $500 in my local currency. I walked into a mall and bought it. I played it a couple of times. One week later, I traveled. I spent 3 months out of town. Sadly, when I returned from my trip, I discovered that my house had been broken into. The PS5 was stolen together with other valuable items. I was upsetWhat is the most expensive thing you've bought with your winnings from a casino or sports bet that you've never used or used only a few times or even maybe regretted buying?

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: The most expensive thing that I've bought with winnings from my sportsbook bet were a car for my girlfriend.Then I've left gambling, I was at some point between the gambling for fun and the addictment. So, better stop before than after. And I'm glad with my choice.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 13, 2022, 02:09:32 PMSome years ago, I won a decent amount of money from a sports bet. It was the equivalent of $550 in my local currency. I was thrilled. I decided that I was going to spoil myself a little. It coincided with the time Sony announced the price of the new PlayStation 5. The price was the equivalent of $500 in my local currency. I walked into a mall and bought it. I played it a couple of times. One week later, I traveled. I spent 3 months out of town. Sadly, when I returned from my trip, I discovered that my house had been broken into. The PS5 was stolen together with other valuable items. I was upsetSorry to hear this kind of story.   I am glad that you were not at home during the robbery.  Or else you could have been hurt in that incident.Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 13, 2022, 02:09:32 PMWhat is the most expensive thing you've bought with your winnings from a casino or sports bet that you've never used or used only a few times or even maybe regretted buying?I won a jackpot in FortuneJack Dice twice, the first one is $18k+ and the next one is $6k+.  This almost covers the cost of a small townhouse worth $26k  so I  just add an extra fund from my earnings in the signature campaign and bought it.   It feels good to buy something from both earnings and luck in gambling.  Though I would not advise making gambling a source of our income but rather take the opportunity to buy something that will appreciate over time when luck presents us the opportunity of winning a huge amount of money.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 13, 2022, 02:09:32 PMWhat is the most expensive thing you've bought with your winnings from a casino or sports bet that you've never used or used only a few times or even maybe regretted buying?The opinion/mindset some have cultivated is that winnings from casino's and sportsbet are free money, and usually cannot be spent on something tangible that you don't get to regret, having cultivated this mindset, if they ever get to win from a casino or sportsbet, they follow suit and spend the money in a rush without thinking and due consideration.  In my case, the only time i have won a substantial amount from a sportsbet, i didn't spend the money in a rush. At that time my annual rent was a month due, i used my winnings to settle it, and the little fraction left well, can't say i remember what i used that for  and that is something i can't say i regret.So the most expensive thing i have spent my winnings on, is not something that i regret.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 13, 2022, 02:09:32 PMWhat is the most expensive thing you've bought with your winnings from a casino or sports bet that you've never used or used only a few times or even maybe regretted buying?The most expensive thing, never, I don't use my bet money in gambling wins to buy luxury or valuable things, I prefer to use it for entertainment or fun, with my friends, such as: going to bars, sightseeing or something like that.Why don't I want to buy expensive things from gambling winnings, because I bet not to buy things.I bet only for the pleasure of my soul, so whatever the value of the win I only use it for fun.I have principles in gambling, my money is at stake, the money wins the bet, the bottom line: I have to distinguish between gambling money and my own money, I mean my steady income, so with my principles like that, I bet a bit calmly, lose or win, not having any intention of buying expensive stuff, I spend it for fun.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: I bought my first gaming laptop worth 1500$(3BTC) from the profit on Bitsler, Bitcoin price that time was around 500$ and I'm very happy about my new laptop but later on after a couple of months, The price of Bitcoin went up to 2000$ which I regretted much for a long time because I can buy a much high end laptop and even more if I just hold my Bitcoin and didn't sold.I was just so happy on my gambling winnings that time and I'm afraid I might lose it once I play again which push me to buy the gadget even though I really don't need it because I have gaming desktop.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: Nothing is bought expensively except for a few small items that are not much but the rest is for entertainment to relax my mind a few days vacation, in sports betting big wins are only a few times the rest are ordinary wins because I bet not too big except the team that in the correct selection accurate with my new prediction I will indeed be greater.In essence, my victory is that I don't need to be expected to buy something because I prefer to eat with my friends or party on the beach it looks very exciting.

comments.author: Viscore
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 13, 2022, 02:09:32 PMSome years ago, I won a decent amount of money from a sports bet. It was the equivalent of $550 in my local currency. I was thrilled. I decided that I was going to spoil myself a little. It coincided with the time Sony announced the price of the new PlayStation 5. The price was the equivalent of $500 in my local currency. I walked into a mall and bought it. I played it a couple of times. One week later, I traveled. I spent 3 months out of town. Sadly, when I returned from my trip, I discovered that my house had been broken into. The PS5 was stolen together with other valuable items. I was upsetWhat is the most expensive thing you've bought with your winnings from a casino or sports bet that you've never used or used only a few times or even maybe regretted buying? That's one thing i came to regret because of all my winnings from gambling, i have never bought something valuable or something that could be very beneficial in the future. I could have bought a piece of lot because its price will certainly appreciate in the future or even a car for my family. All i have are just these small gadgets that i think will only lose value later on. And the rest of my winnings were just lost in a thin air, maybe some were lose too in gambling since i keep chasing my luck that time.

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: I usually don't buy expensive stuff when I win big bets. I spend money on fun things, like going to the beach with friends and traveling to neighboring countries.when I won $3k recently, I spent it on a poor person who was suffering from a spinal fracture that left him paralyzed.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 13, 2022, 02:09:32 PMWhat is the most expensive thing you've bought with your winnings from a casino or sports bet that you've never used or used only a few times or even maybe regretted buying?There is none, I just know that I use the money I won in gambling for fun. If I win, I use it for the weekend fun, if not enough, I add more money to it to have the fun, that is because sometimes, the money will not be enough, the money I do win is usually little and I am not expecting much because I use the amount I can be able to lose to bet. The money won can not buy me anything than to just use it for fun or to play next weekend match.

comments.author: Sirait
comments.body: I once won $350 (so far this is the highest amount I've won bets). With the winning money I bought a custom PC (medium) to play games and other online activities. it's better to use the money from bet wins for other profitable activities, don't use it for unimportant things like buying drugs or going to discotheques.

comments.author: fiulpro
comments.body: Honestly I do not think I did buy something expensive but I did buy something essential, which was groceries for the whole month, I remember when I was able to make my 30$ into a 100$, I was able to buy groceries for the whole month through it which again then helped me sustain and save 70$ which I later pooled up and used for other things as well, for me I was able to do it through crash, it was new and the game was interesting for me but I also lost a lot over time so I do think this all balances it out by itself as well. For me I didn't win that much as well because I do not have such a good luck but then again it was amazing and worth it !

I was upsetWhat is the most expensive thing you've bought with your winnings from a casino or sports bet that you've never used or used only a few times or even maybe regretted buying?When it comes on buying things then i dont really regret on doing so because majority or most of the time on where i do tend to buy something then it would really be on my wishlistSpeaking with gambling profits then i do buy a flagship smartphone and i do still make use of it over a year now and even though this isnt something big but still a considerableamount which you could really able to buy on what you do like or wish for and i dont risk it out again on playing those amounts into gambling because high likelythose amounts be lost back again into the casino.

comments.author: carlfebz2
comments.body: Back into those early years where i do win $1k maximum on slots as far as i remember and half or 3/4 of those winning amount had been used on buying Steam wallet codes and Battle Pass in Dota 2 which my account items and perks was great on that time until i do realize that it would be worth if i do save up instead.Play for fun and never chase up your losses in case you do lost after winning.A common case or situation you would be facing on gambling field.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: well in my case it was as follows, I had 25$ and I made a bet that allowed me to win 75$, then I made a bet again with 25$ and I won 400$. then I took it out and bought something I ate and I don't remember other things I bought, but the fact is that I was very happy with the thing I bought and ate, it was as if it had a different flavor maybe because as I had lost consecutively and then I had victories consecutive so buying that food and eating it tasted different. but I must say that after my streak of victories, I could never have the same luck again, so I started to look at gambling as just fun and I don't bet much or high values anymore.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Bought some laptop before using my gambling profit, though it didn’t happen over night I mean, I kept losing and wining on gambling, i just save some and for me to be able to gamble on a more comfortable way I have to upgrade my laptop and work double time on savings so I can have it. You can be very lucky in gambling sometimes and lucky to those who got the jackpot, for sure they have more to tell here.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: During the Covid -19 Lock-down my family had nothing to eat. I went into a betting house and used the money a just borrowed from someone to try my luck. I was fortunate that I won so much money that would be enough to stock my house with food. I immediately called my wife and she was coming she was complaining that I needed to do something before we starve to death. Immediately I brought out the cash I just won and gave her part of the money to go to the market. My wife gave me the warmest hug I have ever received from her. She went to the market and bought all we needed. I had enough food until the lock-down was lifted. Therefore the most expensive thing I have bought with my winning is a month worth of food for my family of 6.

comments.author: Gosgosking
comments.body: Then when I was still in the college I played a bet which I won $400 I used it to pay for my accommodation,  this is the expensive I have done with my bet won from sport bet. I think this is one of my highest win in gambling because I don't always bet.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I've never had huge winnings when it comes to gambling.  Mostly because I gamble for fun so it's more about putting some extra excitement in the game than it is trying to make money.  I have had a couple big scores though.  I recall one year I bet pretty big against Dallas during Thanksgiving.  The odds were that they were going to win because Tony Romo was coming back from injury and everyone seemed to think he was going to carry them to a win.  I on the other hand thought he was washed, so I made a big bet that paid off.  What did I spend the money on you ask?  Everyone who was with me that Thanksgiving partied pretty well.  It was good times.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I've never bought the most expensive thing from a casino or sports betting because I've never won much money. Maybe what I did was buy some food to eat with my friends and not buy things like you. Even if I buy those expensive things, I don't think I will regret it because I know it was a momentary decision because I already won a lot of money. But I once thought to save the winning money and only use a little to buy food or use it to bet the next day again.
